hymn.title: Before God put the leaves on the trees

layout.singingstanza: Be -- fore God put the leaves on the trees... Be -- fore God made the herbs bear -- ing seeds... He thought a -- bout you... And He thought a -- bout me... And He loved us... And He loved us!

lyrics.stanza: Before God put the leaves on the trees... Before God made the herbs bearing seeds...
He thought about you... And He thought about me... And He loved us... And He loved us!
Before God put the clouds in the sky... Before He taught the birds how to fly...
Before God made the sun giving light... Before God made the stars shining bright...
Before God put the whales in the sea... Before God made the fish swimming free...
Before God made the insects that creep... Before God made the cattle and sheep...
